messages.subject: Jimmy Abbey - UCAS Reference
messages.body:
Hi Anita,

Just a reminder you need to complete Jimmy Abbey's UCAS Reference by end of day tomorrow.

Thanks

Dawn

messages.subject: Jimmy Abbey - Wrong Shoes
messages.body:
Mrs. Abell,

Unfortunately Jimmy's school shoes have become unwearable, I will be taking him shoe shopping this weekend until then I will be sending him in wearing trainers.

I am aware this is against school policy but the only alternative was his wellington boots.

Thanks in Advance

Mr. Abbey
